ygData.subject: More info on psalm series
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the psalm s of purity and vitality do not provide dmg shields. Which is too bad cause i woulda loved to see a dmg shield based on disease and poision :).
ygData.messageBody:
Well the psalm's of purity and vitality do not provide dmg shields. Which
is too bad cause i woulda loved to see a dmg shield based on disease and
poision :). But the psalm of cooling predicatbly does have a cold shield
that freezed amything that hits you.at lvl 40 the dmg is 6 pts too, same as
the psalm of warmth. Interesting thing is the shields dont seem to be
resisted. While fighting in sol b (nafalgar or whatevers lair) i was using
the psalm of warmth (because i hadnt picked up cooling yet) and the kobolds
never resisted them. The kobolds have OUTRAGEOUS fire protection, irritates
the druids to the pt they cant nuke them effectively. But my fireshields
just kept working.
